dct_title_s: Plan of the city of Baltimore : compiled from actual survey
dct_description_sm: Plan of the city of Baltimore : compiled from actual survey. Depth shown by soundings and isolines. Includes tables of population and references. Includes explanations on number of streets and their orientation. Shows railroad lines and waterways. Shows city boundaries and numbered districts. On lower right corner: "B.T. Welch & Co. Sc." "Published by F. Lucas Jr. Baltimore and improved in 1836". "Dec. 2 '22". "Entered according to Act of Congress the 1st day of August 1822 by F. Lucas Jr. at the State of Maryland". Scale of reproduction is not: "Scale of 100 perches to an inch and a half; scale of feet [approximately :13,157]".
